item.title: Xbox 720 Always Online
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I think making a console ‘always online’ would completely ruin the point. No more taking consoles on vacations where you may not have internet, no more playing a console because your internet went out for some reason. I can SOMEWHAT understand PC games being always online, because the internet is such a huge part of PC gaming. I think making the next xbox always online would be horrible. The sad part is, it would still sell well because of the huge following. Similar to how the new Sim City did well even with all of the issues.
